feed.title: Jinjja Hoosier
feed.subtitle: Jinjja, in Korean, means real. Hoosier is just a person from Indiana.

entry.title: Welcome to Jinjja Hoosier
entry.content: Welcome to Jinjja Hoosier, "a blog about nothing". More accurately, a blog not focused on one topic. I'm leaving this blog wide open. We'll see what happens.
